Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Chris' life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]:
At some point in the apocalypse, Chris somehow came into contact with a group named "the Saviors" which he subsequently joined.
Chris aided his group in terrorizing other survivors and communities around the area into subjugating to Negan's will, where their victims would be forced to give half their supplies in exchange for not being murdered.
Chris and 
George
 sit in the back of a truck bound for the 
Sanctuary
 as they wait for the herd to pass along. They discuss about the rigged explosives set up down the road and how 
Fat Joey
 was useful in finding the explosives while scavenging. Upon arriving at the Sanctuary, Chris is killed while attempting to swarm an armed 
Carl
.
Death[]:
Killed By
Carl Grimes
While attempting to swarm an armed Carl after he has killed George, Chris is also shot to death.
Killed Victims[]:
This list shows the victims Chris has killed:
Numerous counts of 
zombies
 and possibly unnamed people
Trivia[]:
In "
Scars
", 
Negan
 reminisces to 
Michonne
 the time Carl snuck into the Sanctuary and gunned down Chris and George.


Chris is the last named character directly killed by 
Carl Grimes
 in the 
TV Series
.
